description: Replacement of existing doors and windows with like for like double glazed replacements.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing/document title number(s): 3062-DR-0100 (Site Location and Block Plan), 3062-DR-3100-R1 (Proposed Front & Side Elevations), 3062-DR-3101 (Proposed Rear Elevation), 3040-DR-8100_R1 (Window Schedule), 3062-DR-8101_R1 (Window Schedule 2 of 2), 3062-DR-3000_R1 (Existing Front & Side Elevations), 3062-DR-3001_R1 (Existing Rear Elevation), 3062-DR-8102-R1 (Window Details - Horizontal Cross-Sections W001 - W006, W102-105), 3040-DR-8102-R1 (Window Details - Vertical Cross-sections W001 - W006, W102-105), 3062-DR-8104-R1 (Window Details - Horizontal Cross-Sections W106-108 and W101), 3062-DR-8105-R1 (Window Details - Vertical Cross-sections W106-108 and W101), 3062-DR-8106_R1 (Door Details - Cross-sections)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
